_meanings:
{@--2@} (In Vedānta) 
Hindrance to the concentration of mind
which is said to be of four kinds,
{#laya, vikzepa, kazAya#} and {#rasAsvAda#}.

{@--4@} (With the Jainas) 
Interference or obstruction offered to those
who are engaged in seeking 
deliverance, and consequent prevention of
their accomplishment of it; one of
the 8 classes of {%karman%}.
